trans-unit.source: Defines a condition with an associated set of actions to perform.

A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> consists of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> and one or both <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> collections.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class using the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class using the name of the `Rule`, the rule condition, and a list of THEN actions.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects to evaluate whether the condition is true.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> class using the name of the `Rule`, the rule condition, a list of THEN actions, and a list of ELSE actions.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects to evaluate if the condition is true.
A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> objects to evaluate whether the condition is false.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> should be evaluated.
When set to `false`, this property is similar to commenting out the rule.
The default is `true`.
`true` if the Rule should be evaluated; otherwise, `false`.
Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> to evaluate.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> to evaluate.
Gets or sets a description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
A description of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes to perform in the ELSE case.

<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ElseActions%2A> typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, calls a method of the activity, or calls static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleStatementAction> modifies a property or calls a method.
A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> to perform in the ELSE case.
Determines whether this instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> and the object passed as the parameter have the same value.
The object to compare the current object to.
`true` if the current object and obj are the same; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
The hash code for this instance.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in which a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> should be run.
<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> classes that have a higher priority value are run before lower priority <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> classes.
Rules that have the same priority are run in the alphabetic order of their name properties.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.Priority%2A> value can be positive or negative.
The default value for any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule> is 0.
A value that indicates the order in which a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> should be run.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleReevaluationBehavior"></xref> indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule"></xref> can be reevaluated.
Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes to perform in the THEN case.

<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule.ThenActions%2A> typically set a variable value on one of the properties of the activity, call a method of the activity, or call static methods on types in referenced assemblies.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction> causes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> to stop executing and returns control to the calling method.
A <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction> explicitly indicates that a rule is updating a variable.
This causes the re-evaluation of any affected rules.
A collection of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> classes to perform in the THEN case.
